plays.text: Even Strength Goal Scored by Corey Perry assisted by Ryan Getzlaf and Dustin Penner

Penalty to Matt Beleskey 2  minutes for Tripping
Penalty to Hampus Lindholm 2  minutes for Holding

Penalty to Bryan Allen 2  minutes for Boarding
Powerplay Goal Scored by Kris Versteeg assisted by Marian Hossa and Brent Seabrook
Penalty to Dustin Penner 10  minutes for Misconduct (10 min)
